class.description: A target for a hyperlink.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of an Anchor.

property.name: name
property.description: Name of the anchor.

property.name: text
property.description: Text of the anchor.

reference.name: anchors[] property of the Document object

class.description: Java applet included in a web page.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of an Applet.

class.description: Defines an area of an image as an image map.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of an image map Area object.

class.description: A graphical button that can be "pressed" by a user.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Button object.

property.name: onclick
property.description: Event handler for when the button is clicked.

property.name: value
property.description: Text that appears on the button.

class.description: A box that the user can check. For groups of checkboxes, users may select multiple checkboxes.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Checkbox object.

property.name: onclick
property.description: Event handler for when the checkbox is clicked.

property.name: checked
property.description: Returns true if the checkbox is checked. False if the checkbox is not checked.

property.name: defaultChecked
property.description: Returns true if the checkbox is checked by default.

property.name: value
property.description: Specifies a string value for when the checkbox is checked.

class.description: Contains information about the current document, including methods to display HTML, XHTML, and XML output to the user.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Document object.

property.name: all
property.description: All HTML elements in the document.

property.name: cookie
property.description: Specifies a cookie or semi-colon delimited list of cookies.

property.name: domain
property.description: Domain name for the server for the current document.

property.name: lastModified
property.description: Date that the document was last modified.

property.name: links
property.description: Array of all links contained in the document.

property.name: URL

reference.name: and title properties of the Document object

property.description: URL of the current document.

property.name: alinkColor
property.description: Gets or sets the color of active links in the document.
property.deprecated: Deprecated in "Document". Use "alinkColor" as part of "Body" instead.

property.name: anchors
property.description: Array of all of the anchors contained in the document.

property.name: applets
property.description: Array of all of the applets contained in the document.

property.name: bgColor
property.description: Gets or sets the background color of the document.
property.deprecated: Deprecated in "Document". Use "bgColor" as part of "Body" instead.

property.name: embeds
property.description: Array of all of the embedded objects in the document.

property.name: fgColor
property.description: Gets or sets the text color for the document.
property.deprecated: Deprecated in "Document". Use "fgColor" as part of "Body" instead.

property.name: forms
property.description: Array of all of the form objects in the document.

property.name: images
property.description: Array of all of the images in the document.

property.name: linkColor
property.description: Gets or sets the color of the links in the document.
property.deprecated: Deprecated in "Document". Use "fgColor" as part of "Body" instead.

property.name: location
property.description: URL of the current document.

property.name: plugins
property.description: Array of all of the plug-ins contained in the document.

property.name: referrer
property.description: URL of the document that called the current document.

property.name: title
property.description: Title of the current document.

property.name: vlinkColor
property.description: Gets or sets the color of visited links in the document.
property.deprecated: Deprecated in "Document". Use "vlinkColor" as part of "Body" instead.

method.name: captureEvents
method.description: Sets the document to capture all events of the specified type.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears the document.

method.name: close
method.description: Closes the document for writing.

method.name: elementFromPoint

parameter.name: x
parameter.description: Horizontal position (in pixels) of the element.

parameter.name: y
parameter.description: Vertical position (in pixels) of the element.

method.description: Returns the element located at the specified point.
method.return-description: Element at the specified location.

method.name: getSelection
method.description: Returns the currently selected text in the document.
method.return-description: The currently selected text.

method.name: handleEvent
method.description: Calls the event handler for the specified event.

method.name: open

parameter.name: mimetype
parameter.description: Type of document that you are writing to. "text/html" is the default

parameter.name: replace
parameter.description: The string "replace". Reuses the entry that the document last used.

method.description: Opens a stream to collect the output from document.write or document.writelin.

method.name: releaseEvents
method.description: Sets the document to release all captured events of a specified type.

method.name: routeEvent
method.description: Routes a captured event through the event hierarchy.

method.name: write
method.description: Writes the specified text to the document.
method.return-description: Returns true if successful.

method.name: writeln
method.description: Writes the specified line of text to the document.
method.return-description: Returns true if successful.

specification.name: enhanced in JavaScript 1.1, Netscape 4, and IE 4

class.description: Contains properties that give details about a JavaScript event.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of an Event object.

property.name: layerX
property.description: Horizontal position (in pixels) of the event relative to the current layer.

property.name: layerY
property.description: Vertical position (in pixels) of the event relative to the current layer.

property.name: pageX
property.description: Horizontal position (in pixels) of the event relative to the current web page.

property.name: pageY
property.description: Vertical position (in pixels) of the event relative to the current web page.

property.name: screenX
property.description: Horizontal position (in pixels) of the event on the screen.

property.name: screenY
property.description: Vertical position (in pixels) of the event on the screen.

property.name: x
property.description: Synonym for layerX.

property.name: y
property.description: Synonym for layerY.

specification.name: incompatible versions supported by Netscape 4 and IE 4

class.description: Element on an HTML form for a user to upload a file.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a FileUpload object.

property.name: onchange
property.description: Occurs when a user changes the value in the field and moves the focus off the field.

property.name: value
property.description: Path and file name to the file being uploaded.

class.description: An HTML form that collects user input.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Form object.

property.name: elements
property.description: Array of all of the elements in a form.

property.name: onreset
property.description: Occurs when a user clicks the Reset button on a form.

property.name: onsubmit
property.description: Occurs when a user clicks a Submit button on a form.

property.name: target
property.description: Window or frame where the submitted results of the form should be displayed. (e.g. "_blank", "_self")

property.name: action
property.description: URL to send the submitted results of the form.

property.name: encoding
property.description: Specifies how the form data should be encoded.

property.name: length
property.description: Number of elements on a form.

property.name: method
property.description: Specifies whether the form data is sent to the server using "get" or "post".

property.name: name
property.description: Name of the form.

method.name: reset
method.description: Resets all of the fields on a form to their initial values.

method.name: submit
method.description: Submits the form data.

class.description: A frame within a frameset in a web browser window.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Frame object.

class.description: An input element on a form that is hidden from a user. Similar to a Text element, except that it is not visible.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Hidden object.

property.name: value
property.description: The value of the field when the form is submitted.

class.description: Array of all of the URLs that a user has visited with the current browser window.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a History object.

property.name: length
property.description: Number of URLs that a user has visited with the current browser window.

method.name: back
method.description: Goes back one to the last previous URL in the history array.

method.name: forward
method.description: Goes forward one to the next URL in the history array.

method.name: go

parameter.name: relative_position
parameter.description: Position of the URL in the history array.

parameter.name: target_string
parameter.description: A string or substring representing the URL in the history array.

method.description: Goes to the specified previously visited URL from the history array.

class.description: Superclass of all HTML element classes.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of an HTMLElement

property.name: onclick
property.description: Event handler for when a user clicks on the element.

property.name: ondblclick
property.description: Event handler for when a user double-clicks the element.

property.name: onhelp
property.description: Event handler for when a user requests Help.

property.name: onkeydown
property.description: Event handler for when a user presses a key on his or her keyboard.

property.name: onkeypress
property.description: Event handler for when a user presses and releases a key on his or her keyboard.

property.name: onkeyup
property.description: Event handler for when a user releases a key on his or her keyboard.

property.name: onmousedown
property.description: Event handler for when a user clicks the mouse button.

property.name: onmousemove
property.description: Event handler for when a user moves the mouse.

property.name: onmouseout
property.description: Event handler for when a user moves the mouse off of the element.

property.name: onmouseover
property.description: Event handler for when a user moves the mouse over the element.

property.name: onmouseup
property.description: Event handler for when a user releases the mouse button.

property.name: all
property.description: List of all elements within the current element. Behaves similarly to document.all.

property.name: children
property.description: The direct child elements of the current element.

property.name: className
property.description: The CSS class that the element belongs to.

property.name: document
property.description: Reference to the Document object that contains the current element.

property.name: id
property.description: Identifier used to assign a unique name to the element.

property.name: innerHTML
property.description: HTML text that the element contains. (Does not include opening and closing tags of the element.)

property.name: innerText
property.description: Plain text that the element contains. (Does not include opening and closing tags of the element.)

property.name: lang
property.description: lang attribute of the element.

property.name: offsetHeight
property.description: Height (in pixels) of the element and its contents.

property.name: offsetLeft
property.description: Horizontal position (in pixels) of the element relative to the offsetParent container element.

property.name: offsetParent
property.description: Container element used as a reference for the offsetLeft and offsetTop elements.

property.name: offsetTop
property.description: Vertical position (in pixels) of the element relative to the offsetParent container element.

property.name: offsetWidth
property.description: Width (in pixels) of the element and its contents.

property.name: outerHTML
property.description: HTML text that the element contains, including its start and end tags.

property.name: outerText
property.description: Plain text that the element contains, including its start and end tags.

property.name: parentElement
property.description: Element that is the direct parent of the current element.

property.name: sourceIndex
property.description: Index of the current element in document.all.

property.name: style
property.description: Inline CSS style attributes for the element.

property.name: tagName
property.description: HTML tag name for the element.

property.name: title
property.description: Title attribute of the HTML tag for the element.

method.name: contains

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The HTML element that the element is to be compared with.

method.description: Determines whether the current element contains the target HTML element.
method.return-description: Returns true if the current element contains the target HTML element.

method.name: getAttribute

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Name of the attribute.

method.description: Gets the value of the specified attribute.
method.return-description: Returns the value of the attribute.

method.name: handleEvent
method.description: Calls the event handler for the specified event.

method.name: insertAdjacentHTML

parameter.name: where
parameter.description: Specifies where the HTML text should be inserted.

parameter.name: text
parameter.description: The HTML text to insert.

method.description: Inserts HTML text in the specified location within or next to the element.

method.name: insertAdjacentText

parameter.name: where
parameter.description: Specifies where the text should be inserted.

parameter.name: text
parameter.description: The plain text to insert.

method.description: Inserts plain text in the specified location within or next to the element.

method.name: removeAttribute

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Name of the attribute to be removed.

method.description: Deletes the specified attribute from the element.
method.return-description: Returns the removed attribute.

method.name: scrollIntoView

parameter.name: top
parameter.description: Specify false to align the bottom of the element with the bottom of the display area. Specify true or nothing to align the top of the element with the top of the display area.

method.description: Scrolls the current document so that the top of current element is either at the top of the display area, or the bottom of the element is at the bottom of the display area.

method.name: setAttribute

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Name of the attribute.

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: Value of the attribute to set.

method.description: Sets the specified attribute to the specified value for the element.

class.description: An image in an HTML document.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of an Image object.

property.name: onabort
property.description: Event handler for when a user aborts the loading of the image.

property.name: onerror
property.description: Event handler for when the loading of the image causes an error.

property.name: onload
property.description: Event handler for when the image loads.

property.name: border
property.description: Width (in pixels) of the image border.

property.name: complete
property.description: Specifies whether the image is completely loaded or not.

property.name: height
property.description: Height (in pixels) of the image.

property.name: hspace
property.description: Amount of horizontal space (in pixels) to insert to the left and the right of the image.

property.name: lowsrc
property.description: URL for an alternate image to display if a user has a low-resolution monitor.

property.name: name
property.description: Name of the image.

property.name: src
property.description: URL of the image.

property.name: vspace
property.description: Amount of vertical space (in pixels) to insert at the top and bottom of the image.

property.name: width
property.description: Width (in pixels) of the image.

class.description: Input element on an HTML form.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of an Input object.

property.name: name
property.description: Name of the element.

property.name: onblur
property.description: Event handler for when focus is moved off the element.

property.name: onchange
property.description: Event handler for when a user changes makes a change element and moves focus off the element.

property.name: onclick
property.description: Event handler for when a user clicks on the element.

property.name: onfocus
property.description: Event handler for when a user gives focus to the element.

property.name: type
property.description: Type of form element the input element is.

property.name: value
property.description: Value of the element when the form is submitted.

property.name: checked
property.description: If the element is a radio button or checkbox, specifies whether or not the element is checked.

property.name: defaultChecked
property.description: If the element is a radio button or checkbox, specifies whether or not the element is checked by default.

property.name: defaultValue
property.description: Specifies the default value for the element text.

property.name: form
property.description: Reference to the form that contains the element.

property.name: length
property.description: Number of options in the options array for the element.

property.name: options
property.description: If the element is a Select list, specifies the list of options (as an array) for the element.

property.name: selectedIndex
property.description: If the element is a Select list, specifies the index of the selected option in the options array.

method.name: blur
method.description: Removes focus from the element.

method.name: click
method.description: Simulates a mouse click on the element. Does not invoke the onClick event handler.

method.name: focus
method.description: Gives focus to the element.

method.name: select
method.description: Selects the text of the element, if applicable.

class.description: A Java array that is wrapped in JavaScript and can be accessed by JavaScript code.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a JavaArray object.

property.name: length
property.description: Number of elements in the Java array.

class.description: JavaScript representation of a Java class.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a JavaClass.

class.description: JavaScript representation of a Java object.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a JavaObject.

class.description: JavaScript representation of a Java package.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a JavaPackage.

class.description: Java representation of a JavaScript object.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a JSObject.

method.name: call

parameter.name: methodName
parameter.description: Method to invoke.

parameter.name: args
parameter.description: Arguments (if any) to be taken by the method.

method.description: Invokes the specified method of the JavaScript object.
method.return-description: Returns a Java object representation of the return value of the method.

method.name: eval

parameter.name: s
parameter.description: Code to be evaluated.

method.description: Evaluates a piece of JavaScript code.
method.return-description: Returns a Java object representation of the result of the evaluated expression.

method.name: getMember

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Name of the property.

method.description: Gets the value of a JavaScript property.
method.return-description: Returns the value of the JavaScript property.

method.name: getSlot

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: Index of the element in the array.

method.description: Gets the value of an element in a JavaScript array.
method.return-description: Returns the value of an element in a JavaScript array.

method.name: getWindow

parameter.name: applet
parameter.description: Applet to obtain a JSObject for.

method.description: Gets a JSObject for a browser window.
method.return-description: Returns a JSObject representation of a browser window.

method.name: removeMember

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Name of the property.

method.description: Deletes a property from a JavaScript object.

method.name: setMember

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Name of the property.

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: Value that the property should be set to.

method.description: Sets the value of a property for a JavaScript object.

method.name: setSlot

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: Index of the element in the array to be set.

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: Value of the element to be set.

method.description: Sets the value of an array element for a JavaScript object.

method.name: toString
method.description: Calls toString on a JavaScript object.
method.return-description: Returns a string representation of the value of the JavaScript object.

class.description: Layer in an HTML document.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Layer object.

property.name: above
property.description: Layer object directly above the current layer in the z-index order.

property.name: background
property.description: Image displayed in the background of the layer.

property.name: below
property.description: Layer object directly below the current layer in the z-index order.

property.name: bgColor
property.description: Background color of the layer.

property.name: clip.bottom
property.description: Bottom edge of the clipping area of the layer, relative to layer.top.

property.name: clip.height
property.description: Height of the clipping area of the layer.

property.name: clip.left
property.description: Left edge of the clipping area of the layer, relative to layer.left.

property.name: clip.right
property.description: Right edge of the clipping area of the layer, relative to layer.right.

property.name: clip.top
property.description: Top edge of the clipping area of the layer, relative to layer.top.

property.name: clip.width
property.description: Width of the clipping area of the layer.

property.name: document
property.description: Document associated with the layer.

property.name: hidden
property.description: Specifies whether a layer is hidden (true) or visible (false).

property.name: layers
property.description: Array of child layers of the current layer.

property.name: left
property.description: Horizontal position (in pixels) of the left edge of the layer.

property.name: name
property.description: Name of the layer.

property.name: pageX
property.description: Horizontal position (in pixels) of the layer relative to the page.

property.name: pageY
property.description: Vertical position (in pixels) of the layer relative to the page.

property.name: parentLayer
property.description: Parent layer of the current layer.

property.name: siblingAbove
property.description: Layer object directly above the current layer in the z-index order that shares the same parent as the current layer.

property.name: siblingBelow
property.description: Layer object directly below the current layer in the z-index order that shares the same parent as the current layer.

property.name: src
property.description: URL for the contents of the layer.

property.name: top
property.description: Vertical position (in pixels) of the top edge of the layer.

property.name: visibility
property.description: Specifies whether the layer should be visible ("show"), hidden ("hide"), or inherit the visibility of the parent layer ("inherit").

property.name: window
property.description: Window or frame object that contains the layer.

property.name: x
property.description: Horizontal position (in pixels) of the left edge of the layer.

property.name: y
property.description: Vertical position (in pixels) of the top edge of the layer.

property.name: zIndex
property.description: Position of the layer in the z-order, relative to its sibling layers.

method.name: captureEvents
method.description: Sets the layer to capture all events of a specified type.

method.name: handleEvent
method.description: Calls the event handler for the specified event.

method.name: load

parameter.name: src
parameter.description: URL for the contents of the layer.

parameter.name: width
parameter.description: New width of the layer.

method.description: Loads contents into the layer and updates the width of the layer.

method.name: moveAbove

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: Layer to move the current layer above.

method.description: Moves the current layer above another layer.

method.name: moveBelow

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: Layer to move the current layer below.

method.description: Moves the current layer below another layer.

method.name: moveBy

parameter.name: dx
parameter.description: Amount to move the layer to the right. Specify a negative value to move the layer to the left.

parameter.name: dy
parameter.description: Amount to move the layer down. Specify a negative value to move the layer up.

method.description: Moves the layer the specified amount down and to the right.

method.name: moveTo

parameter.name: x
parameter.description: Horizontal position (in pixels) of the left edge of the layer.

parameter.name: y
parameter.description: Vertical position (in pixels) of the top edge of the layer.

method.description: Moves the layer to a specified position relative to the document or parent layer.

method.name: moveToAbsolute

parameter.name: x
parameter.description: Horizontal position (in pixels) of the left edge of the layer.

parameter.name: y
parameter.description: Vertical position (in pixels) of the top edge of the layer.

method.description: Moves the layer to a specified position on the page.

method.name: offset

parameter.name: dx
parameter.description: Amount to move the layer to the right. Specify a negative value to move the layer to the left.

parameter.name: dy
parameter.description: Amount to move the layer down. Specify a negative value to move the layer up.

method.description: Moves a layer down and to the right by a specified amount. Deprecated by moveBy().

method.name: releaseEvents
method.description: Sets the layer to release all captured events of a specified type.

method.name: resizeBy

parameter.name: dw
parameter.description: Number of pixels to resize the layer by horizontally.

parameter.name: dh
parameter.description: Number of pixels to resize the layer by vertically.

method.description: Resize the layer by the specified amount.

method.name: resizeTo

parameter.name: width
parameter.description: Number of pixels wide the layer should be.

parameter.name: height
parameter.description: Number of pixels tall the layer should be.

method.description: Resize the layer to a specified size.

method.name: routeEvent
method.description: Routes a captured event through the event hierarchy.

class.description: A hypertext link.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Link object.

property.name: onclick
property.description: Event handler for when a user clicks on the link.

property.name: onmouseout
property.description: Event handler for when a user moves the mouse off of the link.

property.name: onmouseover
property.description: Event handler for when a user moves the mouse over the link.

property.name: target
property.description: Window to display the contents of the link.

property.name: hash
property.description: Anchor portion of the URL of the link.

property.name: host
property.description: Host name and port of the URL of the link.

property.name: hostname
property.description: Host name of the URL of the link.

property.name: href
property.description: Complete text of the URL of the link.

property.name: pathname
property.description: Path name portion of the URL of the link. (e.g. "/docs/index.html")

property.name: port
property.description: Port portion of the URL of the link.

property.name: protocol
property.description: Protocol portion of the URL of the link. ("http" or "https")

property.name: search
property.description: Query string portion of the URL of the link.

property.name: text
property.description: Text between the <a> and </a> tags.

class.description: URL of the window.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Location object.

property.name: hash
property.description: Anchor portion of the URL.

property.name: host
property.description: Host name and port of the URL.

property.name: hostname
property.description: Host name of the URL.

property.name: href
property.description: Complete text of the URL.

property.name: pathname
property.description: Path name portion of the URL. (e.g. "/docs/index.html")

property.name: port
property.description: Port portion of the URL.

property.name: protocol
property.description: Protocol portion of the URL. ("http" or "https")

property.name: search
property.description: Query string portion of the URL.

method.name: reload

parameter.name: force
parameter.description: Specify true to reload the document from the server even if it has not been modified since it was last loaded.

method.description: Reloads the current URL.

method.name: replace

parameter.name: url
parameter.description: URL to replace the current document with.

method.description: Replace the document of the current URL with the document from another URL.

class.description: Representation of a MIME (Multipart Internet Mail Extension) data type.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a MimeType object.

property.name: description
property.description: Description of the MIME type.

property.name: enabledPlugin
property.description: Reference to the Plugin object that is configured for the MIME type.

property.name: suffixes
property.description: String listing possible file extensions for the MIME type, separated by commas.

property.name: type
property.description: Name of the MIME type.

class.description: Contains information about the current web browser.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Navigator object.

property.name: appCodeName
property.description: Code name of the browser.

property.name: appName
property.description: Name of the browser.

property.name: appVersion
property.description: Platform and version of the web browser.

property.name: cookieEnabled
property.description: Whether or not the browser has cookies enabled.

property.name: language
property.description: Default language of the web browser.

property.name: mimeTypes
property.description: Array of MIME type objects supported by the web browser.

property.name: platform
property.description: Client OS.

property.name: plugins
property.description: Array of plugins installed in the browser.

property.name: systemLanguage
property.description: Default language of the OS.

property.name: userAgent
property.description: Specifies the value the browser uses for the user-agent header in http requests.

property.name: userLanguage
property.description: Preferred language of the user.

method.name: javaEnabled
method.description: Specifies whether or not Java is supported and enabled by the browser.
method.return-description: Returns true if Java is supported and enabled by the browser.

method.name: plugins.refresh

parameter.name: reload
parameter.description: Specify true if the browser should reload pages that contain <embed> tags and use plugins.

method.description: Makes newly installed plugins available to the web browser.

class.description: Option in a Select list.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of an Option object.

property.name: defaultSelected
property.description: Whether or not the option is selected by default.

property.name: index
property.description: Index in the options array for the option.

property.name: selected
property.description: Whether or not the option is currently selected.

property.name: text
property.description: Text for the option.

property.name: value
property.description: Value of the option that is sent when the form is submitted.

class.description: Text field on a form where the input is masked by asterisks (*).

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Password object.

property.name: value
property.description: Value of the text entered by the user and sent when the form is submitted.

class.description: Plugin installed in the web browser.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Plugin object.

property.name: description
property.description: Description of the plugin.

property.name: filename
property.description: File name of the plugin itself.

property.name: length
property.description: Number of elements in the MimeType array of the data formats supported by the plugin.

property.name: name
property.description: Name of the plugin.

class.description: Graphical radio button in a group of radio buttons.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Radio object.

property.name: onclick
property.description: Event handler for when a user clicks on the radio button.

property.name: checked
property.description: Whether or not the radio button is currently checked.

property.name: defaultChecked
property.description: Whether or not the radio button is checked by default.

property.name: value
property.description: Value of the radio button that is sent when the form is submitted.

class.description: Reset button on an HTML form that resets all form elements to their default values.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Reset object.

property.name: onclick
property.description: Event handler for when a user clicks the button.

property.name: value
property.description: Text displayed on the button.

class.description: Provides information about the display screen and colors.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Screen object.

property.name: availHeight
property.description: Available height (in pixels) of the screen (not allocated to a shortcut bar or similar feature).

property.name: availLeft
property.description: Available space (in pixels) at the far left of the screen (not allocated to a shortcut bar or similar feature).

property.name: availTop
property.description: Available space (in pixels) at the top of the screen (not allocated to a shortcut bar or similar feature).

property.name: availWidth
property.description: Available width (in pixels) of the screen (not allocated to a shortcut bar or similar feature).

property.name: colorDepth
property.description: Depth of the color palette for the screen.

property.name: height
property.description: Total height of the display screen.

property.name: pixelDepth
property.description: Screen color resolution (in bits-per-pixel).

property.name: width
property.description: Total width of the display screen.

class.description: A graphical Select list on an HTML form.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Select object.

property.name: onchange
property.description: Event handler for when a user changes the value of the Select list.

property.name: options
property.description: Array of the options available from the Select list.

property.name: length
property.description: Number of elements in the options array.

property.name: selectedIndex
property.description: Index in the options array for the selected option.

property.name: type
property.description: Type of object represented by the Select list and whether or not multiple selections are allowed.

class.description: Specifies style characteristics of HTML elements.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Style object.

property.name: cssText
property.description: CSS definition for the style.

property.name: media
property.description: Represents the "media" attribute of the "style" element. Set to "screen", "print," or "all".

property.name: parentRule
property.description: Reference to the parent CSSRule.

property.name: type
property.description: Represents the "type" attribute of the "style" element. Set to "text/css" for CSS.

class.description: A graphical button that submits the data of an HTML form when clicked.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Submit object.

property.name: onclick
property.description: Event handler for when a user clicks the button.

property.name: value
property.description: Text displayed on the button.

class.description: Text input field on an HTML form.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Text object.

property.name: onchange
property.description: Event handler for when a user changes the text and moves the focus off of the field.

property.name: value
property.description: Value of the text field to be sent when the form is submitted.

class.description: Multi-line text input field on a form.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Textarea object.

property.name: onchange
property.description: Event handler for when a user changes the text and moves the focus off of the field.

property.name: value
property.description: Value of the textarea field to be sent when the form is submitted.

class.description: URL of the window.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a URL object.

class.description: The Window object represents the web browser window. It provides access to objects to use to manipulate the browsing environment and properties for accessing the object model below it.

constructor.description: Creates a new instance of a Window object.

property.name: defaultStatus
property.description: Gets or sets the default text in the status bar at the bottom of a web browser window.

property.name: name
property.description: Gets or sets the name of a window.

property.name: onabort
property.description: Fires when the loading of the element is cancelled before it finishes loading.

property.name: onafterprint
property.description: Fires immediately after a user prints or print previews a document.

property.name: onbeforeprint
property.description: Fires immediately before a user prints or print previews a document.

property.name: onbeforeunload
property.description: Fires immediately before a document is unloaded.

property.name: onblur
property.description: Event handler for blur events on a window.

property.name: onchange
property.description: Fires when the value of the element changes.

property.name: onclick
property.description: Fires when the element is clicked.

property.name: onclose
property.description: Fires when the user closes the window.

property.name: ondragdrop
property.description: Fires when a user drops a file onto the window.

property.name: onerror
property.description: Event handler for errors raised on a window.

property.name: onfocus
property.description: Event handler for focus events on a window.

property.name: onhelp
property.description: Fires when a user presses the F1 key to activate help.

property.name: onkeydown
property.description: Fires when a user presses down on a key while the element has focus.

property.name: onkeypress
property.description: Fires when a user presses a key or holds down the key while the element has focus.

property.name: onkeyup
property.description: Fires when a user releases a key while the element has focus.

property.name: onload
property.description: Event handler for window loading.

property.name: onmousedown
property.description: Fires when a user clicks down on the mouse button while the element has focus.

property.name: onmousemove
property.description: Fires when the mouse moves while the pointer over the element.

property.name: onmouseout
property.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves off of the element.

property.name: onmouseover
property.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves over the element.

property.name: onmouseup
property.description: Fires when the user releases the mouse button while the element has focus.

property.name: onmove
property.description: Event handler for window move events.

property.name: onreset
property.description: Fires when the form data is reset.

property.name: onresize
property.description: Event handler for window resizing.

property.name: onscroll
property.description: Fires when a user scrolls the element.

property.name: onselect
property.description: Fires when the element is selected.

property.name: onsubmit
property.description: Fires when the form data is submitted.

property.name: onunload
property.description: Event handler for unload events on the window.

property.name: status
property.description: Gets or sets the text in the status bar at the bottom of a web browser window.

property.name: closed
property.description: Indicates whether a window is closed or not.

property.name: document
property.description: Reference to the document that the window contains.

property.name: event
property.description: Instance of an Event that is available to an event handler.

property.name: frames
property.description: An array of the frames in the current window.

property.name: history
property.description: Reference to the History object.

property.name: innerHeight
property.description: Height of the active document area of the window.

property.name: innerWidth
property.description: Width of the active document area of the window.

property.name: length
property.description: Number of frames in the window.

property.name: location
property.description: Gets or sets the current URL of a window.

property.name: Math
property.description: Reference to an object holding math functions and constants.

property.name: navigator
property.description: Reference to the Navigator object.

property.name: opener
property.description: Reference to the window that opened the current window.

property.name: outerHeight
property.description: Gets or sets the outer height of a window.

property.name: outerWidth
property.description: Gets or sets the outer width of a window.

property.name: pageXOffset
property.description: Gets the number of pixels by which the current document has been scrolled horizontally

property.name: pageYOffset
property.description: Gets the number of pixels by which the current document has been scrolled vertically

property.name: parent
property.description: Reference to the parent of the current window or subframe.

property.name: screen
property.description: Reference to the Screen object associated with the window.

property.name: screenLeft
property.description: Gets the x-coordinate of a window relative to the screen on which it is displayed

property.name: screenTop
property.description: Gets the y-coordinate of a window relative to the screen on which it is displayed

property.name: screenX
property.description: Gets the x-coordinate of a window relative to the screen on which it is displayed

property.name: screenY
property.description: Gets the y-coordinate of a window relative to the screen on which it is displayed

property.name: self
property.description: Reference to a Window object itself.

property.name: top
property.description: Reference to the top window in the window hierarchy.

property.name: window
property.description: Reference to the current Window.

property.name: XMLHttpRequest
property.description: Reference to an XMLHttpRequest object.

property.name: Array
property.description: A function responsible for creating new instances of Array objects

property.name: Boolean
property.description: A function responsible for creating new instances of Boolean objects

property.name: Date
property.description: A function responsible for creating new instances of Date objects

property.name: Error
property.description: A function responsible for creating new instances of Error objects

property.name: Function
property.description: A function responsible for creating new instances of Function objects

property.name: Number
property.description: A function responsible for creating new instances of Number objects

property.name: Object
property.description: A function responsible for creating new instances of Object objects

property.name: RegExp
property.description: A function responsible for creating new instances of RegExp objects

property.name: String
property.description: A function responsible for creating new instances of String objects

method.name: alert
method.description: Displays an alert dialogue box.

method.name: back
method.description: Moves back one step in the Window history.

method.name: blur
method.description: Removes focus from the Window.

method.name: captureEvents

parameter.name: eventmask
parameter.description: Type of event to capture.

method.description: Sets the Window to capture all events of the specified type.

method.name: clearInterval

parameter.name: intervalId
parameter.description: Identifier for the interval.

method.description: Clears a delay that was set with the setInterval method.

method.name: clearTimeout

parameter.name: timeoutId
parameter.description: Identifier for the timeout.

method.description: Clears a timeout that was set with the setTimeout method.

method.name: close

reference.name: the closed and opener properties of Window

method.description: Closes the current window.

method.name: confirm

parameter.name: question
parameter.description: Text to display to ask the user a "yes" or "no" question to confirm or cancel.

method.description: Displays a confirmation dialogue box.
method.return-description: Returns true if the user clicks OK.

method.name: createPopup
method.description: Creates a pop-up window

method.name: focus
method.description: Sets the focus on the current Window.

method.name: forward
method.description: Moves forward one step in the Window history.

method.name: getComputedStyle

parameter.name: elt
parameter.description: Document element to get the style information for.

parameter.name: pseudoElt
parameter.description: CSS pseudoelement.

method.description: Computes style information and returns the CSSStyleDeclaration for the specified document Element.
method.return-description: Returns the CSSStyleDeclaration for the specified document Element.

method.name: handleEvent

parameter.name: event
parameter.description: Event to have the event handler called for.

method.description: Calls the event handler for the specified event.
method.return-description: Returns the result of the invoked event handler.

method.name: home
method.description: Returns the browser Window to the browser home page.

method.name: moveBy

parameter.name: dx
parameter.description: Number of pixels to move the window to the right. Use a negative value to move the window to the left.

parameter.name: dy
parameter.description: Number of pixels to move the window towards the bottom of the screen. Use a negative value to move the window up.

method.description: Moves a Window by the specified amount.

method.name: moveTo

parameter.name: x
parameter.description: Number of pixels from the left edge of the screen to set the horizontal position.

parameter.name: y
parameter.description: Number of pixels from the top edge of the screen to set the vertical position.

method.description: Moves the Window to the specified location.

method.name: navigate

parameter.name: url
parameter.description: URL to navigate to.

method.description: Automatically navigates to the specified URL.

method.name: open

parameter.name: url
parameter.description: Sets the URL of the new Window.

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Sets the name of the new Window.

parameter.name: features
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of features for the new Window to have.

parameter.name: replace
parameter.description: Whether or not the URL in the new window should create a new entry in the browser history or replace the current URL.

reference.name: the closed and opener properties of Window

method.description: Opens a new Window.
method.return-description: The new Window that was opened.

method.name: print
method.description: Prints the contents of the current Window.

method.name: prompt

parameter.name: message
parameter.description: Text message or question to display to the user.

parameter.name: default
parameter.description: Default value to display in the text field.

method.description: Displays a dialogue box that prompts the user for input.
method.return-description: String or number entered by the user.

method.name: releaseEvents

parameter.name: eventmask
parameter.description: Type of event to stop capturing.

method.description: Sets the Window to release all captured events of a specified type.

method.name: resizeBy

parameter.name: dw
parameter.description: Number of pixels to resize the window horizontally.

parameter.name: dh
parameter.description: Number of pixels to resize the window vertically.

method.description: Resizes the current window by the specified amount.

method.name: resizeTo

parameter.name: width
parameter.description: Number of pixels wide that the window should be.

parameter.name: height
parameter.description: Number of pixels tall that the window should be.

method.description: Resizes the current window to the specified size.

method.name: routeEvent

parameter.name: event
parameter.description: Event to be routed.

method.description: Routes a captured event through the event hierarchy.
method.return-description: Returns the result of the routed event.

method.name: scroll

parameter.name: x
parameter.description: Horizontal position (in pixels) to scroll to.

parameter.name: y
parameter.description: Vertical position (in pixels) to scroll to.

method.description: Scrolls the window to a specified place in the document.

method.name: scrollBy

parameter.name: dx
parameter.description: Number of pixels to scroll horizontally.

parameter.name: dy
parameter.description: Number of pixels to scroll vertically.

method.description: Scrolls the current document in the window by the specified amount.

method.name: scrollTo

parameter.name: x
parameter.description: Horizontal position (in pixels) to scroll to.

parameter.name: y
parameter.description: Vertical position (in pixels) to scroll to.

method.description: Scrolls the window to a specified place in the document.

method.name: setInterval

parameter.name: code
parameter.description: Expression to be evaluated, if value is a string. Otherwise, the function to call

parameter.name: interval
parameter.description: Number of milliseconds to wait.

parameter.name: args
parameter.description: Arguments (if any) to be taken by the function.

specification.name: IE 4 supports only one of the two forms

method.description: Calls a function or evaluates an expression every time the specified interval elapses.
method.return-description: Returns the result of the function or expression.

method.name: setTimeout

parameter.name: code
parameter.description: Expression to be evaluated (not required if func is used).

parameter.name: func
parameter.description: Function to be called (not required if code is used).

parameter.name: delay
parameter.description: Number of milliseconds to wait.

parameter.name: args
parameter.description: Arguments (if any) to be taken by the function.

method.description: Specifies a delay for calling a function or evaluating an expression.
method.return-description: Result of the function or expression.

method.name: stop
method.description: Stops the window from loading.

class.description: Container object for all other objects in the HTML DOM.

constructor.description: The Global object does not have a constructor.

property.name: undefined
property.description: The value undefined.

method.name: getClass

parameter.name: javaobj
parameter.description: JavaObject to get the JavaClass for.

method.description: Gets the JavaClass object of the specified JavaObject.
method.return-description: Returns the JavaClass for the specified JavaObject.
